name: Jira Software
natural_language_description: 这是 Jira Software 节点。主要用于: Consume Jira Software API

jiraVersion.name: jiraVersion
jiraVersion.natural_language_description: 参数名: Jira Version | 默认值: cloud

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: issue
available_options: Issue (值: issue) - Creates an issue or, where the option to create subtasks is enabled in Jira, a subtask
Issue Attachment (值: issueAttachment) - Add, remove, and get an attachment from an issue
Issue Comment (值: issueComment) - Get, create, update, and delete a comment from an issue
User (值: user) - Get, create and delete a user

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Create (值: create) - Create a new user

project.name: project
project.natural_language_description: 参数名: Project | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

issueType.name: issueType
issueType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Issue Type | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: expand (值: None) - Include more information about the user

issueKey.name: issueKey
issueKey.natural_language_description: 参数名: Issue Key | 作用: The Issue Comment key | (必填项)

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: labels (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression

deleteSubtasks.name: deleteSubtasks
deleteSubtasks.natural_language_description: 参数名: Delete Subtasks | 默认值: False | (必填项)

simplifyOutput.name: simplifyOutput
simplifyOutput.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simplifyOutput.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify | 作用: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data | 默认值: False

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: expand (值: None) - Use expand to include additional information about comments in the response. This parameter accepts Rendered Body, which returns the comment body rendered in HTML.
wikiMarkup (值: None) - Whether to enable parsing of wikiformatting for this comment. Default is false.

jsonParameters.name: jsonParameters
jsonParameters.natural_language_description: 参数名: JSON Parameters | 默认值: False
